publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4076 Jack McConnell: Congratulations to John Higgins—That the Parliament congratulates John Higgins on his achievement of winning the 2009 World Snooker Championship; notes that the Wishaw Wizard has now joined the elite club of snooker players who have won three world titles; notes that a significant number of Scots made an impact in the World Championships, and wishes all those involved in snooker in Scotland every success for the rest of the year.

S3M-4076 Congratulations to John Higgins (lodged on 6 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Elizabeth Smith*, Helen Eadie*, Nanette Milne*, James Kelly*, David Stewart*, Bob Doris*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie McGrigor*, Karen Whitefield*, Mary Scanlon*, Karen Gillon*, Rhona Brankin*, Elaine Smith*, David Whitton*, Ross Finnie*, Claire Baker*, Liam McArthur*, Patricia Ferguson*, Andy Kerr*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Cathy Jamieson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Elaine Murray*, Bill Butler*, Sandra White*, George Foulkes*, John Park*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-4076 Jack McConnell: Congratulations to John Higgins—That the Parliament congratulates John Higgins on his achievement of winning the 2009 World Snooker Championship; notes that the Wishaw Wizard has now joined the elite club of snooker players who have won three world titles; notes that a significant number of Scots made an impact in the World Championships, and wishes all those involved in snooker in Scotland every success for the rest of the year. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Elizabeth Smith, Helen Eadie, Nanette Milne, James Kelly, David Stewart, Bob Doris, Hugh O’Donnell, Jamie McGrigor, Karen Whitefield, Mary Scanlon, Karen Gillon, Rhona Brankin, Elaine Smith, David Whitton, Ross Finnie, Claire Baker, Liam McArthur, Patricia Ferguson, Andy Kerr, Mr Frank McAveety, Cathy Jamieson, Stewart Maxwell, Elaine Murray, Bill Butler, Sandra White, George Foulkes, John Park, Jackie Baillie, Dr Richard Simpson, Ken Macintosh*, Robin Harper*, Des McNulty*, Sarah Boyack*, Pauline McNeill*, Gil Paterson*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-4076 Congratulations to John Higgins (lodged on 6 May 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-4076 Congratulations to John Higgins (lodged on 6 May 2009) Bill Kidd*
